title: Issue with trading champions in new client (unlock skins you don't own for the match)
body:
Here is the set up to reproduce the bug:
1. Select a champ you have a skin for.
2. Select any other skin then the default.
3. The other person selects a champ you do not have a skin for but hopefully the champ selected has the same number of skins as the one you have (if not you'll just get a broken skin name when loading in an be on the default skin for the other champ)
4. Do the trade as normal make sure to not change the skin selection for the champ you have received.

The outcome will be that your new champ will select the skin which is in the same index as the one you traded away regardless if you own it.

- Nozner

replies.body:
Hey Nozner -

Thanks for the awesome bug report! This issue should now be resolved.
